name: Marie
title: Lovely Bomber
acquisitionText:
Anything is possible through alchemy.
Shall we find out what we can accomplish together?

profile.voiceText: I'm Marlone from Salburg Academy. I hope my alchemy can be of some assistance.
profile.description: An energetic, tomboyish alchemist who studied alchemy at the academy in a certain town. She now travels across the regions of Lantarna in search of the truth of alchemy. While she is bright and friendly, she can be lazy and a little careless at times. Her tendency to solve problems with bombs has also earned her a reputation as a bomb enthusiast.
profile.originGame: Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg

A student of the alchemy Academy.
Through his time at the Academy, he has reevaluated himself and is now on a journey to find what he wants to do.
Quiet and perhaps a bit too kind-hearted, he sometimes gets caught up in the problems of others. He used to be shy around people but was able to open up with the help of his schoolmates.

A reserved and direct alchemist.
He used to serve a young lady of a prominent family, but now that he is free, he is on a journey for self-discovery.
Despite seeming unfriendly, he is surprisingly good at taking care of others. He is a capable fighter thanks to the sword skills his grandfather drilled into him at an early age.

A passionate chef.
He is in charge of the kitchen at a cafe in the royal capital. His favorite frying pan, which he uses for cooking, at times doubles as a weapon against monsters.
He often accompanied his childhood friend, the alchemist Rorona, on her gathering expeditions, helping her out whenever she messed things up. He has a mature disposition but hates to lose and can become heated in competitions.

"Don't give up before you try!"
Let's go in search of a new ambition together.

profile.voiceText: Got a problem? Just leave it to Suelle the genius! I can solve any problem!
profile.description: The younger of the Twin Alchemists. She travels together with her sister, Lydie, striving to become an alchemist that everyone can turn to. She cherishes a promise she made with her mother when she was young. She's mischievous and boisterous, but a genius with diverse abilities. She also can't stand insects or ghosts.
profile.originGame: Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~

name: Ryza
title: Master's Right-Hand
acquisitionText:
世界にはまだ知らないことがたくさん――
ワクワクが止まらないよ！

profile.voiceText:
この服の見た目はねー、あたしの先生のを
参考にしてるんだ！　どう、似合うかな？
profile.description:
冒険好きな錬金術士。 
この衣装は彼女に錬金術の教えを授けた恩師、 
アンペル愛用の品に似せたもの。ライザはいつか彼に並び、 
そして超えていくことを目指し、錬金術の修行を続けている。 
これを着ていると無性に甘いものが食べたくなる……らしい。
profile.originGame: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout

私は白牙氏族のリラ・ディザイアス。
オーレン族の戦士だ
profile.description:
謎めいた雰囲気を持つ旅の戦士。
その優れた戦闘能力を活かし、護衛などの仕事をこなしている。
錬金術士のアンペルとは長く旅を共にしていた仲。
冷静沈着で不愛想な性格だが、意外に面倒見の良い一面も。

name: Empel
title: [The Gate Closer]
acquisitionText:
背中を押すのは大人の務めだ。
お前たちは存分にやるといい――！

profile.voiceText:
錬金術による悪事……その真偽や目的は、
慎重に見極めなくてはならないだろうな
profile.description:
流浪の錬金術士。 
ある目的のため、各地の遺跡などを調査している。 
かつて、調査のために訪れた島でライザたちと出会い、 
しばしば行動を共にしていた。 
見た目は若いが言動や所作が成熟しており、不思議な貫禄がある。 
甘いものに目がないという一面も。
profile.originGame: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout

acquisitionText: To the ends of the world or bust! Let's head out!

profile.voiceText: I'm Resna. I'm working really hard to catch up to the other alchemists!
profile.description:
A fledgling alchemist. She is very passionate about alchemy and has an unparalleled love and knowledge of the subject, which is evident in her tendency to get excited and talk very fast.
Her dream is to revive the neglected art of alchemy and use it to enrich people's lives.

I'll overcome anything to make my dream
come true—no matter the obstacle!

profile.voiceText: I'm going to find the World's End and revive alchemy. That's my goal!
profile.description: A fledgling alchemist. Following the instructions of her teacher, Saskia, she usually wears a jacket and arm covers to protect her from harm while harvesting. But from time to time she takes them off so that she can travel unencumbered over the fields and mountains on her way to fulfill her dream—to reach the World's End.

A warrior with amnesia. Relying on her excellent fighting skills, she and Heidi tend to take on a variety of rough jobs. With no memory of her past, she spends her days trying to figure out who she really is.
She has a strong and outspoken personality, but is surprisingly weak when pressured by others.

While that increases her odds of being injured, she believes in wrapping fights up before that happens.
